Job Overview

IT Security Operations role with 3-6 years of experience, located in Navi Mumbai. This is a position at Jio with primary skills in Vulnerability Management, IT security operations, Risk Assessment, Cybersecurity, Governance, Security Audit, Monitor Compliance.

Qualifications And Skills

  • Vulnerability Management
  • IT security operations
  • Risk Assessment
  • Cybersecurity
  • Governance
  • Security Audit
  • GRC
  • Governance, Risk and Compliance

Roles And Responsibilities

  • Implement and maintain IT security operations procedures
  • Conduct risk assessments and vulnerability management
  • Develop and enforce security policies and procedures
  • Perform security audits and monitoring for compliance
  • Participate in cybersecurity incident response and resolution
  • Has experience in GRC.

Location: Mumbai

Experience: 3 to 6 Years

Payroll: Quess
